name: Turis Station
description:
Turis Station is lost between dimensions in the quantum flow. A newly awakened population of Autons try to survive on the scraps that slip through the multiverse.

Collect your Auton and take control of their unique story and augment their life with your digital collections.

The core of Turis Station is a living social simulation, with a living population of characters (Autons) whose lives you can control or manifest as your own avatars. All Autons have a simulated life with emotions and memories.
